body:
i’m thankful, inspired by this thread (

[https://twitter.com/nzle/status/984608118301708293?s=21](https://twitter.com/nzle/status/984608118301708293?s=21)) to have made us egg sandwiches for dinner, and i’m thankful that though our egg sandwiches were probably not as good as that egg sandwich, every egg sandwich is a good egg sandwich and there is no need to rank pleasure.
